shorts.title: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.2M in health care costs
shorts.title_distilled: Lackawanna County contract with SEIU to save $1.
shorts.description: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs
shorts.content: The Lackawanna County Commissioners unanimously ratified a four-year contract Tuesday with the Service Employees International Union that will save the county $1.2 million in health care costs

shorts.title: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to Board of Directors
shorts.title_distilled: Fidelity Bank Welcomes James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A.
shorts.description: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.
shorts.content: DUNMORE, Pa., Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Brian J. Cali, Chairman of the Board of Fidelity Bank, is pleased to announce the appointment of James Clemente, CPA, MT and Rocco A. DelVecchio to its Board of Directors.

shorts.description: CARBONDALE, PA, January 19, 2026 –Gentex Corporation announced the launch of the newly re-designed Ops-Core FAST XP Helmet System, a ballistic helmet solution purpose built and priced for law enforcement. Designed to meet the real-world needs ofspecialized un…

shorts.title: Troopers claim retaliation in lawsuit over alleged payroll fraud

shorts.title: Supervisors deny data center zoning application
shorts.title_distilled: Supervisors deny data center zoning application.
shorts.description: RANSOM TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— It's back to the drawing board for a data center developer in Lackawanna County. Scranton Materials LLC had its zoning application denied Tuesday after failing to make its case to Ransom Township's Board of Supervisors. The developer was seeking to re-zone land in the township to make way for a [...]
shorts.content: RANSOM TOWNSHIP, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU)— It's back to the drawing board for a data center developer in Lackawanna County. The developer was seeking to re-zone land in the township to make way for a [...]

shorts.title: Crews in Lackawanna County braving chilling temperatures
shorts.title_distilled: Crews in Lackawanna County braving chilling temperatures.
shorts.description: SCRANTON, LACKAWANNA COUNTY (WBRE/WYOU) — Many people avoid being outside when the temperature drops, but some people can't avoid it. Workers could be seen bundled up and braving the chilling temperatures in the Electric City. 28/22 News reporter Connor Coar spoke with them and has more from Scranton. Crews are continuing to work on streets [...]
